languages.text: Несущие Слово бросились в самоубийственную контратаку. Взобравшись на борт крейсера, они устроили ожесточенную рубку и добрались до плазменного реактора. В дикой злобе своей еретики вызвали взрыв, что обратил в пепел их самих, наш грозный сухопутный корабль и множество добрых воинов Императора, шедших в ту атаку.

traits.locale_text: Гаргантюозный крейсер одним выстрелом за другим превращал километры земли в выжженую пустошь, испаряя полки врага один за другим. Однако Несущие слово смогли десантироваться на корабль и повредить его основные системы. Космические волки смогли уничтожить прислужников Хаоса, но машинные духи крейсера уснули навсегда.

languages.text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.
languages.original_text: Несущие Слово бросились в самоубийственную контратаку. Взобравшись на борт крейсера, они устроили ожесточенную рубку и добрались до плазменного реактора. В дикой злобе своей еретики вызвали взрыв, что обратил в пепел их самих, наш грозный сухопутный корабль и множество добрых воинов Императора, шедших в ту атаку.

In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

languages.text: 怀言者发起了自杀式反击。他们登上巡洋舰，一路杀到了等离子反应堆前，随后以肆无忌惮的恶意引爆了反应堆。巡洋舰发生了剧烈的爆炸，无论是怀言者，还是帝皇手下无数优秀的战士，都在这场爆炸中化为了灰烬，那艘强大的巡洋舰也毁于一旦。
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

traits.locale_text: 怀言者发起了自杀式反击。他们登上巡洋舰，一路杀到了等离子反应堆前，随后以肆无忌惮的恶意引爆了反应堆。巡洋舰发生了剧烈的爆炸，无论是怀言者，还是帝皇手下无数优秀的战士，都在这场爆炸中化为了灰烬，那艘强大的巡洋舰也毁于一旦。

languages.text: Les Word Bearers ont lancé une contre-attaque suicide. Ils sont montés à bord du croiseur et se sont frayé un chemin sanglant jusqu'à son réacteur à plasma. Dans leur malveillance sans limites, les hérétiques ont provoqué une explosion qui les a réduits en cendres, de même que notre redoutable vaisseau et une grande partie des guerriers de l'Empereur ayant participé à l'attaque.
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

traits.locale_text: Les Word Bearers ont lancé une contre-attaque suicide. Ils sont montés à bord du croiseur et se sont frayé un chemin sanglant jusqu'à son réacteur à plasma. Dans leur malveillance sans limites, les hérétiques ont provoqué une explosion qui les a réduits en cendres, de même que notre redoutable vaisseau et une grande partie des guerriers de l'Empereur ayant participé à l'attaque.

languages.text: ワードベアラーどもは自爆覚悟の反撃を開始した。奴らは巡洋艦に乗り込み、プラズマリアクターまで血の道を切り開いた。その奔放な悪意により、異端者たちは爆発を引き起こし、彼ら自身と我々の恐ろしい陸上艦、そして攻撃に参加した多くの皇帝の優秀な戦士たちを灰にした。
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

traits.locale_text: ワードベアラーどもは自爆覚悟の反撃を開始した。奴らは巡洋艦に乗り込み、プラズマリアクターまで血の道を切り開いた。その奔放な悪意により、異端者たちは爆発を引き起こし、彼ら自身と我々の恐ろしい陸上艦、そして攻撃に参加した多くの皇帝の優秀な戦士たちを灰にした。

languages.text: Los Portadores de la Palabra lanzaron un contraataque suicida. Abordaron el crucero y se abrieron paso hasta el reactor de plasma. En su maldad descontrolada, los herejes detonaron una explosión tan grande que redujo a cenizas a los propios Portadores, nuestra formidable nave terrestre y a gran parte de los guerreros del Emperador que participaban en el ataque.
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

traits.locale_text: Los Portadores de la Palabra lanzaron un contraataque suicida. Abordaron el crucero y se abrieron paso hasta el reactor de plasma. En su maldad descontrolada, los herejes detonaron una explosión tan grande que redujo a cenizas a los propios Portadores, nuestra formidable nave terrestre y a gran parte de los guerreros del Emperador que participaban en el ataque.

languages.text: Die Word Bearers unternahmen einen Gegenangriff, der einem Selbstmordkommando gleichkam. Sie gingen an Bord des Kreuzers und pflügten eine blutige Schneise zum Plasmareaktor. In ihrer zügellosen Tücke lösten die Ketzer eine Explosion aus und pulverisierten sich selbst, unser furchterregendes Landeschiff und unzählige der guten Krieger des Imperators, die an diesem Angriff beteiligt waren.
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.

traits.locale_text: Die Word Bearers unternahmen einen Gegenangriff, der einem Selbstmordkommando gleichkam. Sie gingen an Bord des Kreuzers und pflügten eine blutige Schneise zum Plasmareaktor. In ihrer zügellosen Tücke lösten die Ketzer eine Explosion aus und pulverisierten sich selbst, unser furchterregendes Landeschiff und unzählige der guten Krieger des Imperators, die an diesem Angriff beteiligt waren.

languages.text: Vahyedenler ise bir intihar saldırısıyla karşılık verdi. Gemiyi bordalayıp plazma reaktöründe kanlı bir yara açtılar. Katıksız melanete kapılan kâfirler; mahal verdikleri patlamayla kendilerini kül etmekle kalmadı, kara gemimizin yanı sıra bu saldırıda yer alan İmparator'un değerli askerlerinin de hayatını yitirmesine neden oldu.
languages.original_text: The Word Bearers launched a suicidal counter-attack. They boarded the cruiser and cut a bloody swath to the plasma reactor. In their unbridled malice, the heretics triggered an explosion that made ashes of themselves, our fearsome landship, and a great many of the Emperor's good warriors who took part in that attack.
